content_html: Chitwan, Sept 17: Traffic on the Narayangadh-Muglin roadway has resumed. The road section was obstructed due to landslides that occurred at Tuinkhola Ghoptebhir of Ichhakamana rural municipality-4 and at Namsikhola of the same rural municipality on Tuesday night. Chief of the District Traffic Police Office, Police Inspector Gayatri Sharma, said

title: Traffic resumes on Narayangadh-Muglin road after removal of landslide debris
